p: Quantitative data was tabulated in MS Excel 2016 and exported to IBM SPSS software version 25. Data was subjected to descriptive statistics and expressed as the mean ± SEM. Thereafter, one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was used to determine differences between groups followed by Tukey's post hoc test for pairwise comparison and separation of means at P = 0.05. Unpaired student t-test statistics were performed to determine differences in longevity between the treated and untreated groups of mice.
